product.title: Chinese Street Lake Bridge Pavilion Teahouse Micro Building Set Collection
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Open your door to a world of awesome Chinese building sets

    This amazing building set collection is designed to immerse you into the world of Chinese culture and provide a new way to play and interact with buildings. Collect all three sets to complete the look, where you can find yourself lost in a Tea house, a Pavilion, or even walking over the bridge and watching over the lake. You won't be able to find these stores elsewhere!

    📦 Please note: All building sets do not come with the original box to protect the environment but they do come in separate bags. For further details please see below.* 

    Measurements are shown in the product photos.

    Start building your street today with easy-to-follow instructions taking you through every step to create these beautiful masterpieces.

    The perfect gift for children and adults who love Asia!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our micro building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and cool building blocks today.

    Micro Blocks: Smaller than the traditional building block.


    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. 

    Features

    🏮 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🧧 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🏮 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🧧 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
